entry.def: A hydroplane is a speedboat which rises out of the water when it is travelling fast.

means.word_mean: 1. an airplane that can land on or take off from water;

means.word_mean: 2. a speedboat that is equipped with hydrofoils that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds;
